getStarted.title: Get Started with Web Push Craft
getStarted.description: To use the Web Push Craft platform, you need to add the following to your website:

step1.title: Step 1: Add the script to your website
step1.description: Add the following script to the head section of your website:

step2.title: Step 2: Add the service worker file
step2.description: Download the firebase-messaging-sw.js file and add it to the root directory of your website.
step2.instruction: This file is required to receive web push notifications.
